dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! But it's also, um, about the culture, you know? OECD data shows it's directly linked to not having books at home. Parents are just glued to social media, fake news, mindless TV.

dialogue_turns.text: They've got this mandatory reading program now, but... get this. UNESCO says libraries are key, right? And our libraries here? They're stuck in the 70s. Dark, dusty, nobody goes.
